ComicInfo.Summary: The kick-ass conclusion of "Center City. " The story reaches a climax as definitive anti-heroes Cholly and Flytrap find themselves knee-deep in a mucky feud between power brokers Luvitz and Hobbs. The shanghaied Flytrap is stepping onto the canvas with a brutal meat grinder, The Champ, to settle the feud once and for all. But will Flytrap walk away alive? What happens when the mayhem leaps outside the boxing ring? And who will or will not get out of the way in time? Don't miss this satisfying finish to Suydam's grim film noir action adventure set in the futuristic cesspool of a corrupt human outpost. Frantic pacing, tension and humor combine to create a groundbreaking and compelling epic from a consummate storyteller!
ComicInfo.Title: Center City (Part 4)
